body.content:
Hello
I am a businessman in Turkey. I have a huge amount of money to move out for
my international project in the Philippines. But because of the COVID 19
policy in Turkey, I will need a foreign business man as a partner to
receive the money $25.000.000 (Twenty-Five Million United States Dollars)
on my behalf. This is the only way my Turkish government can approve the
release and transfer of my money for this international project. You will
receive 20% as your share for assistance.

Get back to me if interested. Contact me via private email ;
peter.ijele.alima@gmail.com

Thanks
Mr Petr Ijele ABDOU.
